author: Siobhán O'Grady, Teo Armus
title: Live updates: Trump's push to reopen the economy next month spurs worries over resurgence of coronavirus cases
description: Facing widespread unemployment and volatile markets, the Trump administration is pushing to reopen the U.S. economy as early as next month, despite a rising death toll and warnings from experts that mass testing and social distancing measures are still needed.
content: China reported 42 new cases of coronavirus in the past 24 hours, the National Health Commission said Friday, marking a slight fall compared with the day before. All but four of the new cases reported Thursday were detected in people who recently returned from… [+733 chars]
